channel.title: Teams on Andromeda-light - Software and SAAS Landing Hugo Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Teams on Andromeda-light - Software and SAAS Landing Hugo Theme

item.title: Tom Truyts
item.description: Tom is a professor of public economics at the Université Saint-Louis - Bruxelles.

item.title: Gilles Grandjean
item.description: Gilles holds a Ph.D. from the UCLouvain (2010). He then obtained a post-doc scholarship from the FNRS and is now assistant professor at University Saint-Louis-Bruxelles since 2016.

item.title: Hélène Latzer
item.description: Hélène is assistant professor in Economics at the Université Saint-Louis Bruxelles, as well as Chargée de Recherche CNRS.

item.title: Koen Declerq
item.description: Koen is an Assistant Professor in Economics at UCLouvain – Saint-Louis Bruxelles.

item.title: Francesco Pascucci
item.description: Francesco obtained a joint PhD in Economics from the UCLouvain (Belgium) and the University of Verona (Italy) in 2021.

item.title: Antoine de Mahieu
item.description: Antoine studied civil engineering and economic sciences at UCLouvain. After a first professional experience at at McKinsey & Company, he started a round-the-word bicycle expedition.

item.title: Vasylyna Sheremeta
item.description: Vasylyna graduaded with a Bachelor’s degree in Finance from a Kyiv National University of Trade and Economics and a Reasearch Master’s degree in Economics from University of Warsaw and Université Catholique de Louvain.

item.title: David Sonnewald
item.description: David completed all his studies at Bocconi University, in Milan (BSc in Economics and Social Sciences, MSc in Economics and Management of Government and International Organizations).

item.title: Hugues Annoye
item.description: Hugues holds a bachelor in mathematics and two research masters (one in mathematics and one in statistic) from the UC Louvain.

item.title: Nhi Tung
item.description: Nhi received her degree of PFIEV program in Telecommunications at Hochiminh City University of Technology, which is equivalent to Master’s degree.

item.title: Astrid Adam
item.description: Astrid graduated with honors from a Master in Economics at the Université Catholique de Louvain in 2020 and from a Bachelor in Economics and Management with an Architecture minor in 2018.

item.title: Rory Green
item.description: Rory holds an Erasmus Mundus Joint Masters Degree in Quantitative Economics from Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne, UCLouvain, and Ca' Foscari University of Venice.

item.title: Audric De Bevere
item.description: Audric holds a Master’s degree in Economics from the ESL (UCLouvain).

item.title: Cédric Heuchenne
item.description: Cedric Heuchenne holds a Master’s degree in Applied Sciences and a Ph.
